overview: Filmed live at the Gypsy Tea Room in Dallas, Texas, this concert release captures the raw rock power of alternative act the Burden Brothers. The band (which consists of Vaden Todd Lewis formerly of the Toadies, Taz Bentley, Casey Orr, Corey Rozzoni, and Casey Hess) performs a 16-song set including such favorites as "Buried In Your Black Heart," "Dirty Sanchez," and "You're So God Damn Beautiful." RYFOLAMF also includes music videos for the songs "Shadow," and "Beautiful Night," in addition to behind-the-scenes footage, interviews with individual band members, and more.
title: Burden Brothers: RYFOLAMF
